post.title: i need help with zoombrowser ex!
post.content: i recently downloaded zoombrowser ex 6.5.1 for my canon powershot s30 camera. my computer is windows xp service pack 3. when i connected my camera to download pics, it worked great. now, when i want to view pics to print out or e-mail, the pics are grayed out and say "loading image," and that's it. can you help me please? thanks!!
